feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [LIM1][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 3, 06:00 - 10:00 UTC

Jul 5, 21:18 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 03/08/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 03/08/2023 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on multiple network equipment.
